alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 8:19PM CDT until July 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Central Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 719 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Northport, or 26 miles south of Alliance, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Northport, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Angora, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62 and Broadwater. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
